predictions.text: If a U.S. federal government shutdown begins on 2025-10-01, it will end by 2025-10-06 (inclusive) via enactment of a continuing resolution or full-year appropriations.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation that federal agencies reopen by 2025-10-06 via a signed public law (congress.gov or whitehouse.gov) or OMB directive ending the lapse in appropriations.
monitoring_signals: House and Senate floor schedules and vote announcements
Text and status of a continuing resolution on congress.gov
OMB memos on shutdown operations and re-opening
predictions.rationale: Political incentives and typical short durations suggest a brief stoppage even if a lapse occurs.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing Prices Index for October 2025 will print between 50.0 and 55.0 in the report due by 2025-11-04.
predictions.verification_criteria: Value as published in the ISM Manufacturing Report On Business for October 2025 on ismworld.org.
monitoring_signals: Commodity and energy price moves
Supplier delivery times and order backlogs in regional Fed surveys
USD strength and import price indices
predictions.rationale: Input cost pressures have stabilized; tariffs risk a modest uptick but not a surge.

predictions.text: U.S. New Home Sales (SAAR) for September 2025 will print between 650,000 and 740,000 in the Census release due 2025-10-29.
predictions.verification_criteria: SAAR level reported on census.gov for September 2025 New Residential Sales.
monitoring_signals: MBA Purchase Index
30-year mortgage rate trends (MBA weekly survey)
Homebuilder guidance and order backlogs
predictions.rationale: Sales likely range-bound as mortgage rates remain elevated but income growth supports demand.

predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS quits rate for August 2025 will print between 2.1% and 2.3% in the BLS release on 2025-10-01.
predictions.verification_criteria: Total quits rate as published in the BLS JOLTS news release for August 2025 on bls.gov.
monitoring_signals: NFIB jobs-hard-to-fill and compensation plans
Initial and continuing jobless claims
Online job postings and wage trackers
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and slower wage growth anchor quits near post-pandemic lows.

predictions.text: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 25.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official VIX closing value on cboe.com at or above 25.00 on any date through 2025-10-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Macro event risk (shutdown, CPI/PCE, earnings surprises)
Credit spreads (ICE BofA OAS)
S&P 500 realized volatility and skew
predictions.rationale: Event-heavy October and policy uncertainty raise tail-risk hedging demand.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will close at or below $53,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Daily close for BTC-USD on finance.yahoo.com at or below 53,000.00 on any date through 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: U.S. real yields and DXY
Crypto ETF flows and stablecoin net issuance
Risk sentiment (VIX) and liquidity conditions
predictions.rationale: Tighter financial conditions and risk-off spikes could trigger a downside test.

predictions.text: The Brent–WTI spot spread (FRED: DCOILBRENTEU minus DCOILWTICO) will reach at or above $7.00 per barrel on at least one daily observation by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any FRED daily reading where DCOILBRENTEU − DCOILWTICO ≥ 7.00 by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Cushing inventories and pipeline flows
OPEC+ production decisions and compliance
Freight/shipping disruptions affecting Atlantic Basin crude
predictions.rationale: Logistics and policy risks favor a wider Atlantic premium over inland U.S. barrels.

predictions.text: Henry Hub natural gas spot price (FRED: DHHNGSP) will print at or below $2.30 per MMBtu on at least one daily observation by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any FRED daily reading for DHHNGSP ≤ 2.30 by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: EIA weekly storage injections
Lower-48 dry gas production estimates
NOAA temperature outlooks affecting HDDs/shoulder-season demand
predictions.rationale: High storage and mild weather risk a shoulder-season dip despite LNG demand.

predictions.text: Caixin China Services PMI for October 2025 will print between 51.0 and 53.5 in the release due by 2025-11-05.
predictions.verification_criteria: Headline Caixin China General Services PMI figure as published by S&P Global/Caixin for October 2025.
monitoring_signals: Mobility and travel data around Golden Week
Caixin Manufacturing PMI new orders and employment subindices
Policy stimulus and credit growth indicators
predictions.rationale: Services activity remains in expansion, supported by policy and improving sentiment.

predictions.text: Euro area core HICP (YoY, flash) for October 2025 will print between 2.3% and 2.7% in Eurostat’s 2025-10-31 release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Eurostat flash estimate for HICP excluding energy and unprocessed food for October 2025 within the stated range.
monitoring_signals: Country flash CPI prints (DE, FR, ES, IT)
Energy base effects and services inflation
Negotiated wage indicators and PMI prices
predictions.rationale: Underlying inflation continues to ease gradually amid weaker goods inflation and moderating services.

predictions.text: Boeing (BA) will report at least 45 commercial aircraft deliveries for October 2025 in its monthly update published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Boeing’s official October 2025 orders and deliveries update or press release lists ≥45 commercial deliveries.
monitoring_signals: FAA oversight changes and issuance of airworthiness certificates
Supplier cadence (Spirit AeroSystems) and rework progress
Airline acceptance schedules and ferry flights
predictions.rationale: Self-certification resumption should lift 737 MAX and 787 handovers from subdued levels.

predictions.text: Electronic Arts (EA) will announce a definitive agreement to be acquired or taken private at an equity value of at least $50 billion by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: An EA press release or 8-K filing confirms a signed definitive merger agreement with stated equity value ≥ $50B by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: LBO financing market conditions and loan syndication appetite
Regulatory/antitrust chatter and HSR filings
Leak frequency and confirmed bidder consortium composition
predictions.rationale: Reports suggest advanced talks, but financing and regulatory hurdles temper odds.

predictions.text: U.S. 5-Year Breakeven Inflation Rate (FRED: T5YIE) will reach at or above 2.25% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any daily observation for FRED series T5YIE ≥ 2.25% by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Oil prices and gasoline futures
Fed communications and term premium moves
Survey-based measures (UMich, SPF) and inflation swaps
predictions.rationale: Tariff overhang and sticky services inflation support breakevens drifting higher near term.
